      • fortify

        public void fortify(java.io.File file,
                    java.util.List<java.lang.String> country_list,
                    java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.lang.Integer> army_per_country)
             throws java.lang.Exception
        This method will perform fortification.
        Parameters:
        country_list - This parameter contains list of countries owned by particular player.
        army_per_country - This parameter contains hash map of armies for each country.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

      • checkConnection

        public int checkConnection(java.io.File file,
                           java.lang.String country1,
                           java.lang.String country2,
                           java.util.List<java.lang.String> country_list,
                           java.util.List<java.lang.String> list)
                    throws java.lang.Exception
        This method will check if given two countries are connected or not.
        Parameters:
        country1 - This parameter contains country value from which army will be fortify.
        country2 - This parameter contains country value to which army will be fortify.
        Returns:
        This method will return integer value if given countries are connected(1) or not(0).
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

      • fortification

        public void fortification(java.io.File file,
                          int i,
                          java.util.List<java.util.List<java.lang.String>> country_per_player,
                          java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.lang.Integer> army_per_country,
                          int attack_army,
                          int defend_army,
                          java.lang.String attack_country,
                          java.lang.String defend_country)
                   throws java.lang.Exception
        This method is for fortification phase
        Parameters:
        file - is file name
        i - is index of current player
        country_per_player - no of countries per player
        army_per_country - no of armies per country
        attack_army - no of attacker armies
        defend_army - no of defender armies
        attack_country - is name of attacker country
        defend_country - is name of defender country
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception
